author: 56cdab144f85abfb36c6c089
summary: Outputs the waveform of an audio file.

ports.name: Render
ports.text: Renders the waveform and triggers `Next` when done

ports.name: Audio Buffer
ports.text: Connect this to an Ops.WebAudio.AudioBuffer op, which loads and holds an audio sample

ports.name: Samples Per Pixel
ports.text: Controls how detailled the waveform is, the smaller the value the more detail and the wider the output.

ports.name: Show bottom half
ports.text: When enabled the top half of the waveform will be mirrored, when disabled only the upper half is drawn

ports.name: Center Origin
ports.text: When enabled the waveform will be centered around the origin, e.g. useful when using `OrbitControls` and rotating around the origin. When disabled the waveform will start at the origin.

ports.name: Render Active
ports.text: If you only need the `Spline Points` or `Geometry` (not render it in the op), you can disable this to save resources.

ports.name: Next
ports.text: Called after `Render` was called, triggers the next op

ports.name: Spline Points
ports.text: The single points of the Waveform, can be connected e.g. to a `SimpleSpline`-op.

ports.name: Geometry
ports.text: The geometry of the waveform, can be drawn e.g. with `RenderGeometry`
